title: React Essentials
description: Learn the fundamentals of React: components, props, state, hooks, and JSX. Build your first interactive app.

title: Advanced React Patterns
description: Master advanced React concepts: custom hooks, context API, performance optimization, and design patterns.

title: Full-Stack Web Development
description: Build complete web applications with React frontend, Node.js backend, and databases. Deploy to production.

title: JavaScript Mastery
description: Deep dive into JavaScript: ES6+, async/await, promises, closures, and modern JavaScript practices.
